title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.54 - Persons driving highway vehicles within terminal required to be duly licensed to operate such vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.54 - Persons driving highway vehicles within terminal required to be duly licensed to operate such vehicles

State Regulations

No person shall drive any highway vehicle (except a
horse-drawn vehicle) in the terminal without a motor vehicle operator's or
chauffeur's license issued by appropriate governmental authority permitting the
driving by such person of the particular type of vehicle driven and valid
within the State of New York. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1220.54

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
